name: Douglas Mawson
what_did:
Mawson explored Antarctica and survived freezing winds and danger.
He studied rocks, ice, and the land during his journeys.
His bravery and science helped people learn more about the coldest place on Earth.
why_matters:
Mawson helped map Antarctica and showed the power of courage and science.
He is one of Australia’s most famous explorers.
fun_fact: There’s a whole station in Antarctica named after Mawson!
